page.title: 17Shopping at Fine Fare
page.content: We interviewed shoppers outside the {Fine Fare }supermarket in Clay Cross. It is a food and groceries shop. There are two other supermarkets in Clay Cross_Kwik Save and the Co-op.{41%}go} to shop from{less than 1km}away. Some people lived as far out as Stonebroom which is 7km away.{27%}came from more than {5km}away.{45%}travel to the shop by{car.}Most of the rest walk,although {14%}come by{bus.}Some people come to this shop because it has a large variety of goods.People think that the staff are friendly and some people say that the prices are cheap .Nearly all the people we interveiwed said that they also shop elsewhere for food.The most popular placeis KwikSave which is next door to Fine Fare.Some people go to the Co-op as well. Two people go to Chesterfield and one even goes to Morrisons in Staveley.
